item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) is like being a detective at a party full of numbers. Let’s take the Heart Disease Prediction Dataset as an example. Imagine you walk into this party, and instead of guests, there are columns of data: ages, blood pressures, cholesterol levels, and so on. Your job as the detective is to mingle with these numbers, get to know them, and uncover their secrets. You start by looking around to see who’s who.
